products.description: All-in-one commerce platform to build and grow online and in-person stores. Helps entrepreneurs and merchants of any size manage catalog, checkout, and multichannel sales. Delivers scalability, integrated payments, and a unified admin to save time and boost revenue.

Point-of-sale system that connects in-person selling to your Shopify backend. Helps retail stores and pop-ups sync inventory, orders, and customer profiles. Speeds checkout, reduces stock errors, and creates seamless omnichannel experiences.

Enterprise-grade Shopify platform for high-growth and large brands needing custom workflows. Helps enterprises scale global commerce with APIs, automation, and advanced support. Reduces time-to-market and improves conversion with tailored performance and controls.

Integrated payments solution that processes transactions directly within Shopify. Helps merchants reduce friction and streamline checkout with built-in fraud tools and simplified reconciliation. Lowers cart abandonment and removes third-party payment complexity.

Fulfillment service combining warehousing and shipping integrated into Shopify stores. Helps merchants speed delivery and lower logistics costs through distributed inventory and carrier optimization. Improves delivery SLAs and customer satisfaction while reducing fulfillment overhead.

Audience and acquisition tool that finds high-value buyers across channels. Helps merchants scale advertising with segmented, lookalike audiences and data-driven targeting. Increases ROAS and reduces customer acquisition cost with pre-built, high-intent segments.

Merchant financing program offering cash advances and loans directly through Shopify. Helps growing retailers access quick funding for inventory, marketing, or expansion without lengthy bank processes. Speeds growth with flexible repayment tied to sales velocity.

Marketplace of customizable storefront themes optimized for conversion and brand experience. Helps merchants launch polished online stores quickly with responsive, tested layouts. Reduces design time and increases conversion through UX-optimized templates.

Ecosystem of apps and integrations that extend Shopify with marketing, fulfillment, analytics and more. Helps merchants and developers add functionality without custom builds. Accelerates feature adoption, enabling tailored operations and improved merchant ROI.

mappings.pain_point: Complex international checkout and tax rules increase abandoned carts during cross-border purchases.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Plus centralizes global checkout and tax tools to reduce cross-border friction, cutting international cart abandonment up to 15% and accelerating checkout conversions.

mappings.pain_point: Inventory mismatches between online and stores cause stockouts and lost sales during peak seasons.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify POS synced with Shopify Fulfillment Network keeps inventory unified across channels, reducing stockouts by ~20% and shortening fulfillment time by 1-2 days.

mappings.pain_point: Payment reconciliation across multiple processors creates accounting overhead and delayed close cycles.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Payments consolidates transactions and reporting, lowering reconciliation time by 50% and reducing payment disputes by up to 30%.

mappings.pain_point: Launching new campaigns globally requires lengthy developer cycles and bespoke integrations.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Plus and the Shopify App Store enable pre-built integrations and APIs to cut time-to-market by ~40%, enabling faster campaign rollouts.

mappings.pain_point: Forecasting suffers from siloed data across channels, harming merchandising decisions.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify's unified admin centralizes sales and customer data, improving forecast accuracy by ~25% and enabling data-driven merchandising decisions.

mappings.pain_point: High spend on acquisition with poor audience targeting reduces marketing ROI.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Audiences supplies high-intent segments that can lift ROAS by 20-35%, lowering CAC while increasing conversion from paid channels.

mappings.pain_point: Scaling into new markets strains cash flow when buying seasonal inventory.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Capital provides quick merchant financing so brands can stock inventory faster; typical customers accelerate inventory buys and see sales growth of 10-25% during launches.

mappings.pain_point: Customer acquisition costs are rising and ad campaigns underperform across regions.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Audiences targets lookalike buyers across channels, improving conversion rates by ~15% and reducing CAC by up to 20%.

mappings.pain_point: Operational inefficiencies slow order fulfillment and increase shipping costs as volume grows.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Fulfillment Network optimizes distributed inventory and carrier selection to cut fulfillment costs 10-25% and improve delivery times by 1-3 days.

mappings.pain_point: Revenue teams lack a single source of truth causing longer deal cycles and misalignment.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify centralizes commerce and customer data so revenue teams reduce sales cycle friction by ~20% and shorten negotiation time by weeks.

mappings.pain_point: Manual payment dispute handling ties up finance resources and delays cash flow.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Payments with fraud tools reduces chargebacks and dispute handling time by ~30%, improving cash flow predictability.

mappings.pain_point: Designing a store that converts without hiring expensive agencies delays launches.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Themes provides conversion-optimized templates that cut design time by 50% and help SMB brands launch with professional UX immediately.

mappings.pain_point: Cross-border VAT complexity and shipping choices lead to abandoned carts in EU customers.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify's built-in international settings and Shopify Payments streamline VAT and checkout, reducing EU cart abandonment by ~12% and improving conversion.

mappings.pain_point: Limited marketing budget makes audience discovery and ad targeting inefficient.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Audiences helps identify high-value segments that improve ROAS by 10-25% so SMBs get more revenue from the same ad spend.

mappings.pain_point: Keeping inventory in sync across marketplaces and website causes oversells.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify's unified inventory in the Shopify admin reduces oversells by ~70% and lowers manual reconciliation work by half.

mappings.pain_point: App selection and compatibility concerns slow feature adoption.
mappings.value_proposition: The Shopify App Store offers curated, compatible apps that accelerate feature rollout and cut integration risk, reducing dev time by ~30%.

mappings.pain_point: High CAC from untargeted ads limits growth runway for emerging DTC brands.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Audiences supplies pre-built high-intent segments that can lower CAC by 15-30%, improving acquisition efficiency for DTC campaigns.

mappings.pain_point: Managing promotions across channels creates coupon misuse and revenue leakage.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify centralizes promotions and discount rules, reducing promo errors by ~40% and protecting margins during large campaigns.

mappings.pain_point: Slow checkout flow on mobile leads to lost conversions from social traffic.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify's mobile-optimized checkout and Shopify Payments reduce mobile abandonment and can lift mobile conversion rates by ~10-20%.

mappings.pain_point: Limited access to fast growth capital delays inventory replenishment during spikes.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Capital offers quick funding tied to sales, enabling faster inventory turns and capturing peak-season demand without bank delays.

mappings.pain_point: Fragmented analytics make measuring marketing ROI time-consuming.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify central reporting consolidates conversions, CLTV and campaign metrics, cutting analysis time by 50% and improving budget allocation.

mappings.pain_point: Onboarding many sellers with inconsistent store setups increases support costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify and the Shopify App Store provide standardized templates and integrations, reducing onboarding time by ~60% and lowering support tickets.

mappings.pain_point: Managing payouts and multi-party payments is operationally complex and error-prone.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Payments and platform APIs streamline transaction flows and reconciliation, cutting payout reconciliation time by ~40%.

mappings.pain_point: Scaling fulfillment for thousands of sellers spikes shipping costs and slows delivery.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Fulfillment Network offers distributed warehousing to reduce carrier costs 10-20% and improve average delivery windows by days.

mappings.pain_point: Marketplace discovery and cross-seller advertising underperform without audience signals.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Audiences enables targeted segments across sellers to improve cross-seller campaign CTRs by ~25% and increase shared revenue.

mappings.pain_point: Platform extensibility needs reliable developer tools to avoid regressions.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify's developer tools and changelog accelerate integrations and reduce regressions, cutting developer effort for integrations by ~30%.

mappings.pain_point: Limited technical resources slow store launches and time to first sale.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify and Shopify Themes let small retailers launch a polished store in days, shortening time-to-first-sale by up to 80% compared with custom builds.

mappings.pain_point: High fees from third-party payment processors eat into small margins.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Payments reduces reliance on external gateways and simplifies fees, improving net margin on transactions by several percent and reducing admin work.

mappings.pain_point: Local shipping options and logistics are complex and costly for small volumes.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Fulfillment Network or local integrations optimize shipping choices to lower average shipping costs by ~10-18% and improve delivery reliability.

mappings.pain_point: Finding customers outside the local market is difficult with limited ad budgets.
mappings.value_proposition: Shopify Audiences helps identify cost-effective segments to expand reach and improve initial campaign conversion rates by ~10-20%.

sequences.name: Seq - US Enterprise Retail - E-commerce
sequences.objective: Engage commerce leaders about reducing international cart abandonment and unifying omnichannel operations

touches.objective: Introduce international checkout friction and conversion opportunity
touches.subject_line: Reduce cross-border cart abandonment by 15%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, many enterprise retailers see higher abandonment at international checkout. With Shopify Plus we helped a peer reduce international cart abandonment ~15% by centralizing tax and checkout flows. Quick 15-minute call to explore?
touches.hints: Mention their recent expansion or region-specific sales figures; reference a competitor using Shopify Plus if possible.

touches.objective: Reinforce international checkout pain and offer a short case study
touches.subject_line: How global checkout simplified for a retailer
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, saw your role driving global commerce. We reduced international cart abandonment 15% for a similar retailer using Shopify Plus + Shopify Payments. Happy to share the short case study.
touches.hints: Personalize by noting a recent product launch or store opening in a new country.

touches.objective: Show unified ops benefits (POS + Fulfillment) and suggest workshop
touches.subject_line: Unify in-store and fulfillment to prevent stockouts
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, inventory mismatches cost retailers sales during peaks. Shopify POS paired with Shopify Fulfillment Network cut stockouts ~20% for a client. Can we schedule a 20-minute workshop to map this to your peak season?
touches.hints: Include a peak-season metric for their category and suggest a specific time window for a workshop.

touches.objective: Offer ROI snapshot and invite to exec briefing
touches.subject_line: Estimate: 20% fewer stockouts and faster fulfillment
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, we can model potential impact across your stores—Shopify Fulfillment Network often reduces fulfillment time by 1-2 days and lowers costs 10-25%. Interested in a short ROI briefing?
touches.hints: Attach a one-pager ROI estimate and note team members who should attend (ops, finance).

touches.objective: Direct ask for meeting and next steps
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, this is [Your Name] from Shopify — following up on our emails about reducing international abandonment and unifying POS/fulfillment. Do you have 20 minutes this week to review an ROI model?
touches.hints: Reference prior email subject and offer two concrete time slots; mention a mutual customer if applicable.
